stitch chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet blo - back loop only gauge swatch 12 stitches = 3 5 row = 3 pattern note chain 2 at the beginning of each row counts as first double_crochet finished size ca 4 x 6 you can easily change the length by adding or subtracting rounds and the width by adding or subtracting from the foundation chain in multiples of 2 +3 for this project i suggest using 100% cotton yarn esther`s hands copyright ©2022 facebook/instagram @esthershands 3 chain 19 round 1 double_crochet in the 4th chain double_crochet in the next 14 chain 2 double_crochet in the last chain continue working on the other side of the chain double_crochet in the next 14 chain 2 double_crochet in last chain join with slip_stitch to the bl of the top of the first double_crochet chain 2 34 round 2 double_crochet blo in the next 33 sts join with slip_stitch to the bl of the top of the first double_crochet chain 2 34 round 3-10 repeat round 2 round 11 double_crochet blo in the next 33 sts join with slip_stitch to the bl of the top of the first double_crochet 34 finish off weave in end how to attach the cord weave in the hemp cord between every 2 double_crochet sts starting at the edge of the seam in the last row make a knot * * * thank you very much for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it i m looking forward to seeing your finished projects on social media please use #spasoapsaver by tagging @esthershands esther`s hands copyright ©2022 facebook/instagram @esthershands
